about_the_game:
Explore the first area of Destroy the Wall. Level up, collect character advancements, and master the unique control scheme. In addition to showcasing the game, this demo also exists to gather feedback to make the final product better. You can tell me what you think through Steam reviews and this form: https://forms.gle/qCdm6bcPuaQZFpRU9.

Playtime: 10-20 minutes, variable based on skill
Content: 19 Screens, less than 10% of what will be in the final game
Options: Only for volume at the moment, the full game will probably have difficulty and accessibility features
Narrative: This is just a slight hook for what will grow into a much larger story in the full game
Graphics/Audio: Around what the full game will look like, although I may make minor improvements

  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT or AMD Radeon HD 2400 or better

short_description: A demo for Destroy the Wall: a 2D metroidvaina action game with a unique control scheme where you control a snake constantly chasing your cursor. This demo gives you a chance to understand this game's mechanics, and it gives me a chance to listen to your feedback and improve my game.
